title: House Twenty8
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Indian, Organic, Mediterranean, Juice bar, Take-out, Asian, British, European, French, Middle Eastern, Spanish
description: A family run vegan and vegetarian cafe, coffee house, juice and smoothie bar and food pantry. Uses all-organic ingredients on the breakfast and lunch menu based on season and with daily specials. Menu includes many gluten-free, refined sugar free and dairy free options. Has a community vibe in the heart of a busy little village in Hampshire and frequent venue for evening events. Lovely rustic interior with plenty of seating and outdoor garden decking under wooden gazebo.
